about.title: About Clean Energy Consultants
about.intro: Clean Energy Consultants Pvt. Ltd. (CEC Nepal) is Nepal's leading engineering consultancy firm specializing in hydropower, renewable energy, and infrastructure development.

history.milestone: From a small consultancy to Nepal's most trusted hydropower engineering firm

expertise.title: Feasibility Studies
expertise.description: Comprehensive FSR, UFSR, and DPR preparation

expertise.title: Renewable Energy
expertise.description: Solar, wind, and other sustainable energy solutions

expertise.title: Infrastructure Design
expertise.description: Specialized designs for challenging Himalayan terrain

team.description: A dedicated team of experienced professionals committed to sustainable energy development

achievements.title: 50+ Projects Delivered
achievements.description: Successfully completed hydropower and renewable energy projects across Nepal

achievements.title: 1000+ MW Developed
achievements.description: Contributed significantly to Nepal's clean energy capacity

achievements.title: International Recognition
achievements.description: Collaborated with international energy firms and development organizations

achievements.title: Trusted Partner
achievements.description: Preferred consultant for multilateral development banks and government agencies
